title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
OB: When a table report item is added to the application without setting a dataset, the group dialog is not shown.
EB: The expected behavior is that the group dialog should be shown even if the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Insert a table report item to the application without setting a dataset.
2. Try creating a new table group.
3. Verify that the group dialog is displayed and allows defining a group despite the undefined dataset.
